name: SmashPong
description:
KEYBOARD SETTINGS

Restart Game = Enter

Pause= Shift

MOVEMENT Player 1 

Up = W

Down = S

Smash = SpaceBar

MOVEMENT Player 2

Up = Up Arrow

Down = Down Arrow

Smash = Numpad 0

FEATURES
  • Using The Surface Nearer to The Tips of the Paddle Results in Sharper Angles!
  • Smash Ability That Shrinks Your Paddle but Speeds Up Your Swing. Time and Position Carefully!
  • Cool PowerUps That Power Only You Up(NOT YOUR OPPONENT)! Speed/Blink/Shrink
